name: Imagination != Replicable
description:
IMAGINATION != REPLICABLE

This is an experiment we are performing to test our artificial intelligence model "GeomAItry". We're trying to see if it can generate recognizable objects out of basic shapes. We've given it a list of objects to generate, and your job is to try your best to figure out what those objects are. Your choices will be sent to us to further improve our AI. Enter what you think the object is into the text box. Then press the check button. If you're unsure, just press the question mark button.

-The Team at AImage Co.

Note from RGC Exists:
I tried adding music but I couldn't figure out how to get it to play in the browser. I TRIED MAKING IT PLAY WHEN THE WINDOW FOCUSED! If you want music, feel free to download the windows version, but note that it's such a small game that it might not be worth it. This is my first GDevelop game so I'm kinda confused. <:)
